about_the_game: Get your style on lock in Titanfall 2 with Tone Prime. This sleek new chassis changes the shape of the Tone Titan, also unlocking new sound effects and a devastating execution. Make your rocket salvos that much more suave with Tone Prime!
detailed_description: Get your style on lock in Titanfall 2 with Tone Prime. This sleek new chassis changes the shape of the Tone Titan, also unlocking new sound effects and a devastating execution. Make your rocket salvos that much more suave with Tone Prime!
name: Titanfall™ 2: Tone Prime
short_description: Get Tone Prime today to give your Tone an all-new look, unique sound effects and a new execution.
